mapper.select: select q.*, p.product_name, p.product_main_image, m.center_name from t_qna q, t_product p, t_member m WHERE p.member_id = #{member_id} and qna_parent_no=0 and q.product_id = p.product_id and p.member_id=m.member_id group by qna_no order by q.qna_write_date desc
select * from t_qna where qna_parent_no != 0 order by qna_write_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_qna(qna_parent_no, product_id, member_id, qna_answer_state, qna_secret, qna_title, qna_contents) values(#{qna_parent_no}, #{product_id}, #{member_id}, #{qna_answer_state}, #{qna_secret}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_contents})
mapper.update: update t_qna set qna_title = #{qna_title}, qna_contents = #{qna_contents} where qna_no = #{qna_no}
mapper.delete: delete from t_qna where qna_no = #{qna_no} or qna_parent_no = #{qna_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_qna where qna_parent_no = #{qna_no}
